aws_redshift_subnet_group.description: Provides a Redshift Subnet Group resource.

name.description: The name of the Redshift Subnet group.

description.description: The description of the Redshift Subnet group. Defaults to "Managed by Terraform".

subnet_ids.description: An array of VPC subnet IDs.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource.

arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Redshift Subnet group name
